definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man

sentences.english: I bought a second-hand five Cpiece suite.
sentences.chinese: 我買了一套二手的五件套傢俱。

sentences.english: Her husband, who sells used car parts, has seen his commissions drop.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫經銷二手次車配件，他的薪酬也下降了。

sentences.english: Then the rate hike on second-hand housing market in our province the true impact of what?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，加息對二手房市場在我們省的真正影響是什麼？

sentences.english: No one wants to overpay for used equipment.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人願意多付的二手設備。

sentences.english: I got this Beatles CD in the second-hand shop for a pound.
sentences.chinese: 這張甲殼蟲樂隊的CD在二手店才賣一英鎊。

sentences.english: The first five months of 2008, the second-hand car totally maintained large increase of business volume.
sentences.chinese: 2008年前五個月，二手車累計交易量大幅增長。

sentences.english: Are you willing to shop around for used gear if needed?
sentences.chinese: 你是否願意在必要時去淘二手裝備？

sentences.english: The used car bought by Peter looks the same as a new car.
sentences.chinese: 皮特買的鄢輛二手車看起來跟新的一樣。

sentences.english: Unequaled selection of both new and used equipment.
sentences.chinese: 無可匹敵的選擇新的和二手設備。

sentences.english: Idle at home articles, second-hand conversion, buy or transfer information.
sentences.chinese: 家中閒置的物品，二手轉換，求購或轉讓信息。

sentences.english: Secondhand smoke causes at least half the cases of lung cancer in non-smokers.
sentences.chinese: 二手菸會導致至少二分之一的不吸菸者致癌。

sentences.english: It was I that (who) bought a second-hand computer yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天買了一臺二手電腦。

sentences.english: Compliments heard second-hand have more credibility within the intended recipient.
sentences.chinese: 二手讚美比刻意在人前奉承更能取信於人。

sentences.english: You don't have to spend money to enjoy secondhand shopping.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要花錢來關注於二手商品的買賣。
我兒子是個二手䜰汽車商。

sentences.english: The second hand geography book is as good as new.
sentences.chinese: 這本二手地理書幾乎還是新的。

definition: to sell off/to get rid of in a sale
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
